alert.note: Alert for Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL SCIOTO COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Rosemount, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, New Boston, Rosemount, Otway, Lombardsville, Friendship, Mcdermott, West Portsmouth and Turkey Creek Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
